channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Hundreds of active-duty troops on are standby to deploy to Minnesota, Trump escalates tensions across Europe with new threats over Greenland, Israel r...

item.title: Protest at Minnesota Church Service Adds to Tensions Over ICE Tactics
item.description: The Justice Department said it would investigate the protest over a pastor’s apparent role in immigration enforcement in the state.

item.title: Troops stand by to enter Minnesota. And, Trump plans for a Board of Peace
item.description: Minnesota braces for federal troops amid immigration protests. And, Trump asks nations to buy into a new U.S.-led board of peace to manage Gaza and ot...

item.title: Survivors of Deadly Train Crash in Spain Describe Hellish Scenes
item.description: Photographs show a tangled mess of metal, wires and broken glass at the scene of the crash, which killed at least 39 people.

item.title: Gaza’s Board of Peace: What to Know
item.description: Numerous countries say they have been invited to join President Trump’s newly minted organization, which critics say could undermine the United Nation...

item.title: Trump says he's pursuing Greenland after perceived Nobel Peace Prize snub
item.description: "Considering your Country decided not to give me the Nobel Peace Prize… I no longer feel an obligation to think purely of Peace," Trump wrote in a mes...

item.title: Italian fashion designer Valentino dies at 93
item.description: Garavani built one of the most recognizable luxury brands in the world. His clients included royalty, Hollywood stars, and first ladies.

item.title: Trump Administration to Appeal Limits on Interactions With Minnesota Protesters
item.description: Justice Department lawyers said they would ask an appellate court to review an injunction that imposes limits on the tactics used by immigration agent...

item.title: Sheinbaum reassures Mexico after US military movements spark concern
item.description: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum quelled concerns on Monday about two recent movements of the U.S. military in the vicinity of Mexico that have the...

item.title: How 40 People Died In a Train Crash in Andalucia, Spain
item.description: The victims of Spain’s deadliest rail crash in more than a decade included a police officer, journalists and a family returning from a musical.

item.title: Spain Scrutinizes Break in Track After 2 Trains Collide, Killing 40
item.description: Crews were working to retrieve bodies after two high-speed trains derailed in southern Spain. The regional authorities said 41 people were hospitalize...

item.title: Taxing the Ultrarich
item.description: The number of billionaires has exploded, yet they often pay taxes at rates well below average.

item.title: Federal Reserve Inquiry Clouds Trump’s Supreme Court Bid to Oust Lisa Cook
item.description: The court is set to hear Ms. Cook’s case challenging her firing as the Justice Department investigates Jerome H. Powell, the central bank chair.

item.title: Slow Emergency Response Blamed in Deadly Pakistan Mall Fire
